entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 8:28 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 8:28 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 8:28 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
